languages.text: "А не возьмет Вольный Торговец, так возьму я. Не бойся, Пропащий, я не дам твоим словам остаться пустым хвастовством".
"If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."
languages.original_text: "А не возьмет Вольный Торговец, так возьму я. Не бойся, Пропащий, я не дам твоим словам остаться пустым хвастовством".

traits.locale_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."

traits.locale_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “就算行商浪人不带你上战场，我也会带你的。别担心，迷途之人，我会负责让你履行你的豪言壮语。”
languages.original_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."

traits.locale_text: “就算行商浪人不带你上战场，我也会带你的。别担心，迷途之人，我会负责让你履行你的豪言壮语。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「自由開拓者がお前を連れて行かなければ、俺が連れて行く。心配するな、エバーロスト。お前の言葉が空威張りにならないよう計らってやる」
languages.original_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者がお前を連れて行かなければ、俺が連れて行く。心配するな、エバーロスト。お前の言葉が空威張りにならないよう計らってやる」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no te acoge, lo haré yo. No te preocupes, Perdido. Me encargaré de que tus palabras no sean más que promesas vacías».
languages.original_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."

traits.locale_text: «Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no te acoge, lo haré yo. No te preocupes, Perdido. Me encargaré de que tus palabras no sean más que promesas vacías».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne te conduit pas au combat, c'est moi qui le ferai. Ne t'inquiète pas, Égaré, je ferai en sorte que tes paroles ne restent pas lettre morte. »
languages.original_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."

traits.locale_text: « Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne te conduit pas au combat, c'est moi qui le ferai. Ne t'inquiète pas, Égaré, je ferai en sorte que tes paroles ne restent pas lettre morte. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Euch nicht mitnimmt, werde ich es tun. Keine Sorge, Siegtnie, ich sorge dafür, dass Eure Worte keine leeren Versprechungen bleiben."
languages.original_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Euch nicht mitnimmt, werde ich es tun. Keine Sorge, Siegtnie, ich sorge dafür, dass Eure Worte keine leeren Versprechungen bleiben."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Hür Tacir seni yanına almazsa ben alırım. Endişelenme Hepgaip, sözlerinin karşılık bulması için elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "If the Rogue Trader does not take you, I will. Do not worry, Everlost, I'll see to it that your words do not remain empty boasts."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir seni yanına almazsa ben alırım. Endişelenme Hepgaip, sözlerinin içi boş böbürlenmelerden ibaret olmaması için elimden geleni yapacağım."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
